short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily inject CSS into a webpage for testing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin allows you to easily add CSS into a webpage for testing. The editor is available through a popup or the devtools.

Features:
* Enable/Disable CSS
* Download CSS
* Upload CSS
* Dark mode
* Word wrap
* Autocomplete
* Devtools support
* Remember last input
